ai.summary: Ock Valley River Walk is a short, easy 1.4 km riverside walk in the UK. The route follows a flat, well-maintained path along the river, offering tranquil water views and a relaxed pace suitable for walkers of all ages.
ai.terrain_summary: Flat, well-drained surface with mixed textures: tarmac or compact gravel along the riverside, occasional boardwalk sections, and some shaded stretches. The surface remains even but can become muddy after rain.
ai.safety_notes: Stay away from the river edge where there are gaps or unstable banks. Keep children within armâ€™s reach and dogs on a leash. Check weather and footwear grip; bring rain gear in wet conditions. Stay on marked paths and observe local accessibility notes if mobility is limited.
recommended_gear: Map or smartphone with offline map
ai.best_seasons: Spring through autumn; year-round can be enjoyable in milder UK weather.

seo.title: Ock Valley River Walk - Easy 1.4 km Riverside Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Discover the Ock Valley River Walk: a short, easy 1.4 km riverside hike in the UK. Flat terrain, serene water views, safety tips and gear for a relaxing day.
